verses.verse: Then <WG5119> shall the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> be likened <WG3666> <WG5701> unto ten <WG1176> virgins <WG3933>, which <WG3748> took <WG2983> <WG5631> their <WG846> Menorahs <WG2985>, and went forth <WG1831> <WG5627> to meet <WG529> <WG1519> the bridegroom <WG3566>.
And <WG1161> five <WG4002> of <WG1537> them <WG846> were <WG2258> <WG5713> wise <WG5429>, and <WG2532> five <WG4002> were foolish <WG3474>.
They <WG3748> that were foolish <WG3474> took <WG2983> <WG5631> their <WG846> <WG1438> Menorahs <WG2985>, and took <WG2983> <WG5627> no <WG3756> oil <WG1637> with <WG3326> them <WG1438>:
But <WG1161> the wise <WG5429> took <WG2983> <WG5627> oil <WG1637> in <WG1722> their <WG846> vessels <WG30> with <WG3326> their <WG846> Menorahs <WG2985>.
While <WG1161> the bridegroom <WG3566> tarried <WG5549> <WG5723>, they all <WG3956> slumbered <WG3573> <WG5656> and <WG2532> slept <WG2518> <WG5707>.

And <WG1161> at midnight <WG3319> <WG3571> there was a cry <WG2906> made <WG1096> <WG5754>, Behold <WG2400> <WG5628>, the bridegroom <WG3566> cometh <WG2064> <WG5736>; go ye out <WG1831> <WG5737> to <WG1519> meet <WG529> him <WG846>.
Then <WG5119> all <WG3956> those <WG1565> virgins <WG3933> arose <WG1453> <WG5681>, and <WG2532> trimmed <WG2885> <WG5656> their <WG846> Menorahs <WG2985>.

And <WG1161> the foolish <WG3474> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto the wise <WG5429>, Give <WG1325> <WG5628> us <WG2254> of <WG1537> your <WG5216> oil <WG1637>; for <WG3754> our <WG2257> Menorahs <WG2985> are gone out <WG4570> <WG5743>.

But <WG1161> the wise <WG5429> answered <WG611> <WG5662>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Not so; lest <WG3379> there be <WG714> not <WG3756> enough <WG714> <WG5661> for us <WG2254> and <WG2532> you <WG5213>: but <WG1161> go ye <WG4198> <WG5737> rather <WG3123> to them <WG4314> that sell <WG4453> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> buy <WG59> <WG5657> for yourselves <WG1438>.

And <WG1161> while they <WG846> went <WG565> <WG5740> to buy <WG59> <WG5658>, the bridegroom <WG3566> came <WG2064> <WG5627>; and <WG2532> they that were ready <WG2092> went in <WG1525> <WG5627> with <WG3326> him <WG846> to <WG1519> the marriage <WG1062>: and <WG2532> the door <WG2374> was shut <WG2808> <WG5681>.
Afterward <WG1161> <WG5305> came <WG2064> <WG5736> also <WG2532> the other <WG3062> virgins <WG3933>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, YY <WG2962>, open <WG455> <WG5657> to us <WG2254>.
But <WG1161> he answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, I know <WG1492> <WG5758> you <WG5209> not <WG3756>.

Watch <WG1127> <WG5720> therefore <WG3767>, for <WG3754> ye know <WG1492> <WG5758> neither <WG3756> the day <WG2250> nor <WG3761> the hour <WG5610> wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> cometh <WG2064> <WG5736>.

For <WG1063> the kingdom of heaven is as <WG5618> a man <WG444> travelling into a far country <WG589> <WG5723>, who called <WG2564> <WG5656> his own <WG2398> servants <WG1401>, and <WG2532> delivered <WG3860> <WG5656> unto them <WG846> his <WG846> goods <WG5224> <WG5723>.

And <WG2532> unto one <WG3739> <WG3303> he gave <WG1325> <WG5656> five <WG4002> talents <WG5007>, <WG1161> to another <WG3739> two <WG1417>, and <WG1161> to another <WG3739> one <WG1520>; to every man <WG1538> according <WG2596> to his several <WG2398> ability <WG1411>; and <WG2532> straightway <WG2112> took his journey <WG589> <WG5656>.

Then <WG1161> he that had received <WG2983> <WG5631> the five <WG4002> talents <WG5007> went <WG4198> <WG5679> and traded <WG2038> <WG5662> with <WG1722> the same <WG846>, and <WG2532> made <WG4160> <WG5656> them other <WG243> five <WG4002> talents <WG5007>.
And <WG2532> likewise <WG5615> he that had received <WG3588> two <WG1417>, he <WG846> also <WG2532> gained <WG2770> <WG5656> other <WG243> two <WG1417>.

But <WG1161> he that had received <WG2983> <WG5631> one <WG1520> went <WG565> <WG5631> and digged <WG3736> <WG5656> in <WG1722> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> hid <WG613> <WG5656> his <WG846> lord's <WG2962> money <WG694>.

After <WG1161> <WG3326> a long <WG4183> time <WG5550> the lord <WG2962> of those <WG1565> servants <WG1401> cometh <WG2064> <WG5736>, and <WG2532> reckoneth <WG4868> <WG5719> <WG3056> with <WG3326> them <WG846>.

And so <WG2532> he that had received <WG2983> <WG5631> five <WG4002> talents <WG5007> came <WG4334> <WG5631> and brought <WG4374> <WG5656> other <WG243> five <WG4002> talents <WG5007>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, thou deliveredst <WG3860> <WG5656> unto me <WG3427> five <WG4002> talents <WG5007>: behold <WG2396>, I have gained <WG2770> <WG5656> beside <WG1909> them <WG846> five <WG4002> talents <WG5007> more <WG243>.

<WG1161> His <WG846> lord <WG2962> said <WG5346> <WG5713> unto him <WG846>, Well done <WG2095>, thou good <WG18> and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> servant <WG1401>: thou hast been <WG2258> <WG5713> faithful <WG4103> over <WG1909> a few things <WG3641>, I will make <WG2525> thee <WG4571> ruler <WG2525> <WG5692> over <WG1909> many things <WG4183>: enter thou <WG1525> <WG5628> into <WG1519> the joy <WG5479> of thy <WG4675> lord <WG2962>.

<WG1161> He also <WG2532> that had received <WG2983> <WG5631> two <WG1417> talents <WG5007> came <WG4334> <WG5631> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, YY <WG2962>, thou deliveredst <WG3860> <WG5656> unto me <WG3427> two <WG1417> talents <WG5007>: behold <WG2396>, I have gained <WG2770> <WG5656> two <WG1417> other <WG243> talents <WG5007> beside <WG1909> them <WG846>.

His <WG846> lord <WG2962> said <WG5346> <WG5713> unto him <WG846>, Well done <WG2095>, good <WG18> and <WG2532> faithful <WG4103> servant <WG1401>; thou hast been <WG2258> <WG5713> faithful <WG4103> over <WG1909> a few things <WG3641>, I will make <WG2525> thee <WG4571> ruler <WG2525> <WG5692> over <WG1909> many things <WG4183>: enter thou <WG1525> <WG5628> into <WG1519> the joy <WG5479> of thy <WG4675> lord <WG2962>.

Then <WG1161> <WG2532> he which had received <WG2983> <WG5761> the one <WG1520> talent <WG5007> came <WG4334> <WG5631> and said <WG2036> <WG5627>, YY <WG2962>, I knew <WG1097> <WG5627> thee <WG4571> that <WG3754> thou art <WG1488> <WG5748> an hard <WG4642> man <WG444>, reaping <WG2325> <WG5723> where <WG3699> thou hast <WG4687> not <WG3756> sown <WG4687> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> gathering <WG4863> <WG5723> where <WG3606> thou hast <WG1287> not <WG3756> strawed <WG1287> <WG5656>:

And <WG2532> I was afraid <WG5399> <WG5679>, and went <WG565> <WG5631> and hid <WG2928> <WG5656> thy <WG4675> talent <WG5007> in <WG1722> the earth <WG1093>: lo <WG2396>, there thou hast <WG2192> <WG5719> that is thine <WG4674>.

<WG1161> His <WG846> lord <WG2962> answered <WG611> <WG5679> and said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto him <WG846>, Thou wicked <WG4190> and <WG2532> slothful <WG3636> servant <WG1401>, thou knewest <WG1492> <WG5715> that <WG3754> I reap <WG2325> <WG5719> where <WG3699> I sowed <WG4687> <WG5656> not <WG3756>, and <WG2532> gather <WG4863> <WG5719> where <WG3606> I have <WG1287> not <WG3756> strawed <WG1287> <WG5656>:

Thou <WG4571> oughtest <WG1163> <WG5713> therefore <WG3767> to have put <WG906> <WG5629> my <WG3450> money <WG694> to the exchangers <WG5133>, and <WG2532> then at my coming <WG2064> <WG5631> I <WG1473> should <WG302> have received <WG2865> <WG5668> mine own <WG1699> with <WG4862> usury <WG5110>.
Take <WG142> <WG5657> therefore <WG3767> the talent <WG5007> from <WG575> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> give <WG1325> <WG5628> it unto him which hath <WG2192> <WG5723> ten <WG1176> talents <WG5007>.

For <WG1063> unto every one <WG3956> that hath <WG2192> <WG5723> shall be given <WG1325> <WG5701>, and <WG2532> he shall have abundance <WG4052> <WG5701>: but <WG1161> from <WG575> him <WG846> that hath <WG2192> <WG5723> not <WG3361> shall be taken away <WG142> <WG5701> <WG575> even <WG2532> that which <WG3739> he hath <WG2192> <WG5719>.

And <WG2532> cast ye <WG1544> <WG5720> the unprofitable <WG888> servant <WG1401> into <WG1519> outer <WG1857> darkness <WG4655>: there <WG1563> shall be <WG2071> <WG5704> weeping <WG2805> and <WG2532> gnashing <WG1030> of teeth <WG3599>.

When <WG1161> <WG3752> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> shall come <WG2064> <WG5632> in <WG1722> his <WG846> glory <WG1391>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the holy <WG40> angels <WG32> with <WG3326> him <WG846>, then <WG5119> shall he sit <WG2523> <WG5692> upon <WG1909> the throne <WG2362> of his <WG846> glory <WG1391>:

And <WG2532> before <WG1715> him <WG846> shall be gathered <WG4863> <WG5701> all <WG3956> nations <WG1484>: and <WG2532> he shall separate <WG873> <WG5692> them <WG846> one <WG240> from <WG575> another <WG240>, as <WG5618> a shepherd <WG4166> divideth <WG873> <WG5719> his sheep <WG4263> from <WG575> the goats <WG2056>:
And <WG2532> he shall set <WG2476> <WG5692> <WG3303> the sheep <WG4263> on <WG1537> his <WG846> right hand <WG1188>, but <WG1161> the goats <WG2055> on <WG1537> the left <WG2176>.

Then <WG5119> shall the King <WG935> say <WG2046> <WG5692> unto them on <WG1537> his <WG846> right hand <WG1188>, Come <WG1205> <WG5773>, ye blessed <WG2127> <WG5772> of my <WG3450> Father <WG3962>, inherit <WG2816> <WG5657> the kingdom <WG932> prepared <WG2090> <WG5772> for you <WG5213> from <WG575> the foundation <WG2602> of the world <WG2889>:

For <WG1063> I was an hungred <WG3983> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> ye gave <WG1325> <WG5656> me <WG3427> meat <WG5315> <WG5629>: I was thirsty <WG1372> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> ye gave <WG4222> me <WG3165> drink <WG4222> <WG5656>: I was <WG2252> <WG5713> a stranger <WG3581>, and <WG2532> ye took <WG4863> me <WG3165> in <WG4863> <WG5627>:

Naked <WG1131>, and <WG2532> ye clothed <WG4016> <WG5627> me <WG3165>: I was sick <WG770> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> ye visited <WG1980> <WG5662> me <WG3165>: I was <WG2252> <WG5713> in <WG1722> prison <WG5438>, and <WG2532> ye came <WG2064> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> me <WG3165>.

Then <WG5119> shall the righteous <WG1342> answer <WG611> <WG5700> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, when <WG4219> saw we <WG1492> <WG5627> thee <WG4571> an hungred <WG3983> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> fed <WG5142> <WG5656> thee? or <WG2228> thirsty <WG1372> <WG5723>, and <WG2532> gave thee drink <WG4222> <WG5656>?

<WG1161> When <WG4219> saw we <WG1492> <WG5627> thee <WG4571> a stranger <WG3581>, and <WG2532> took thee in <WG4863> <WG5627>? or <WG2228> naked <WG1131>, and <WG2532> clothed <WG4016> <WG5627> thee ?
<WG1161> Or when <WG4219> saw we <WG1492> <WG5627> thee <WG4571> sick <WG772>, or <WG2228> in <WG1722> prison <WG5438>, and <WG2532> came <WG2064> <WG5627> unto <WG4314> thee <WG4571>?

And <WG2532> the King <WG935> shall answer <WG611> <WG5679> and say <WG2046> <WG5692> unto them <WG846>, Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, Inasmuch <WG1909> as <WG3745> ye have done <WG4160> <WG5656> it unto one <WG1520> of the least <WG1646> of these <WG5130> my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, ye have done <WG4160> <WG5656> it unto me <WG1698>.

Then <WG5119> shall he say <WG2046> <WG5692> also <WG2532> unto them on <WG1537> the left hand <WG2176>, Depart <WG4198> <WG5737> from <WG575> me <WG1700>, ye cursed <WG2672> <WG5772>, into <WG1519> everlasting <WG166> fire <WG4442>, prepared <WG2090> <WG5772> for the devil <WG1228> and <WG2532> his <WG846> angels <WG32>:

For <WG1063> I was an hungred <WG3983> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> ye gave <WG1325> <WG5656> me <WG3427> no <WG3756> meat <WG5315> <WG5629>: I was thirsty <WG1372> <WG5656>, and <WG2532> ye gave <WG4222> me <WG3165> no <WG3756> drink <WG4222> <WG5656>:

I was <WG2252> <WG5713> a stranger <WG3581>, and <WG2532> ye took <WG4863> me <WG3165> not <WG3756> in <WG4863> <WG5627>: naked <WG1131>, and <WG2532> ye clothed <WG4016> <WG5627> me <WG3165> not <WG3756>: sick <WG772>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> prison <WG5438>, and <WG2532> ye visited <WG1980> <WG5662> me <WG3165> not <WG3756>.

Then <WG5119> shall they <WG846> also <WG2532> answer <WG611> <WG5700> him <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, YY <WG2962>, when <WG4219> saw we <WG1492> <WG5627> thee <WG4571> an hungred <WG3983> <WG5723>, or <WG2228> athirst <WG1372> <WG5723>, or <WG2228> a stranger <WG3581>, or <WG2228> naked <WG1131>, or <WG2228> sick <WG772>, or <WG2228> in <WG1722> prison <WG5438>, and <WG2532> did <WG1247> not <WG3756> minister <WG1247> <WG5656> unto thee <WG4671>?

Then <WG5119> shall he answer <WG611> <WG5700> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, Verily <WG281> I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto you <WG5213>, Inasmuch <WG1909> as <WG3745> ye did <WG4160> <WG5656> it not <WG3756> to one <WG1520> of the least <WG1646> of these <WG5130>, ye did <WG4160> <WG5656> it not <WG3761> to me <WG1698>.
And <WG2532> these <WG3778> shall go away <WG565> <WG5695> into <WG1519> everlasting <WG166> punishment <WG2851>: but <WG1161> the righteous <WG1342> into <WG1519> life <WG2222> eternal <WG166>.
